mod.name: Marisa（霧雨　魔理沙）
mod.description: Adds Marisa（霧雨　魔理沙） from Touhou Project as a new playable character.

cards.name: Exhaustion
cards.description:
Unplayable.
While in hand, you cannot gain or consume Charge-up.

cards.name: Wraith
cards.description:
Unplayable.
At the end of your turn, gain 1 Wraith .

cards.name: Defend
cards.description: Gain 5 Block.

cards.name: Defend+
cards.description: Gain 8 Block.

cards.name: Master Spark
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
Amplify  [E]  : Deal 15 damage instead.

cards.name: Master Spark+
cards.description:
Deal 11 damage.
Amplify  [E]  : Deal 20 damage instead.

cards.name: Rising Sweep
cards.description: Deal 4 damage. Gain 1 Charge-up.

cards.name: Rising Sweep+
cards.description: Deal 5 damage. Gain 2 Charge-up.

cards.name: Simple Spark
cards.description: Deal 6 damage.

cards.name: Simple Spark+
cards.description: Deal 9 damage.

cards.name: 66C
cards.description:
Innate.
Deal 8 damage.
Deals double damage if there are no cards in your discard pile.

cards.name: 66C+
cards.description:
Innate.
Deal 11 damage.
Deals double damage if there are no cards in your discard pile.

cards.name: 6A
cards.description: Deal 5 damage. Gain Block equal to the unblocked damage dealt.

cards.name: 6A+
cards.description: Deal 7 damage. Gain Block equal to the unblocked damage dealt.

cards.name: Acceleration
cards.description:
Draw top 2 cards in your draw pile.
Amplify  [E] : Draw top 1 cards in your draw pile.

cards.name: Acceleration+
cards.description:
Draw top 2 cards in your draw pile.
Amplify  [E] : Draw top 2 cards in your draw pile.

cards.name: Asteroid Belt
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block.
Amplify  [E]  : Next turn, gain 8 Block.

cards.name: Asteroid Belt+
cards.description:
Gain 11 Block.
Amplify  [E]  : Next turn, gain 11 Block.

cards.name: Double Spark
cards.description: Deal 6 damage. Add 1 Spark to your hand.

cards.name: Double Spark+
cards.description: Deal 8 damage. Add 1 Upgraded Spark to your hand.

cards.name: Galactic Halo
cards.description: Gain 12 Block and 2 Charge-up.

cards.name: Galactic Halo+
cards.description: Gain 14 Block and 3 Charge-up.

cards.name: Grand Cross
cards.description:
Deal 13 damage.
Costs 0 if you have activated an Amplify effect this turn.

cards.name: Grand Cross+
cards.description:
Deal 18 damage.
Costs 0 if you have activated an Amplify effect this turn.

cards.name: Gravity Beat
cards.description: Deal 6 damage and draw a card for every 12 cards in your master deck.

cards.name: Gravity Beat+
cards.description: Deal 8 damage and draw a card for every 12 cards in your master deck.

cards.name: Illusion Star
cards.description:
Add 2 random cards to your hand. Put a card from your hand on top of your draw pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Illusion Star+
cards.description:
Add 3 random cards to your hand. Put a card from your hand on top of your draw pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Luminous Strike
cards.description:
Deal damage equal to 2 times the number of cards in your hand( 0 damage).
Amplify  [E]  : Deal damage equal to 4 times your current energy instead( 4 damage).

cards.name: Luminous Strike+
cards.description:
Deal damage equal to 3 times the number of cards in your hand( 0 damage).
Amplify  [E]  : Deal damage equal to 5 times your current energy instead( 5 damage).

cards.name: Milky Way
cards.description:
Gain 5 Block. Draw 1 card.
ALL Attacks in your hand deal 1 additional damage this combat.

cards.name: Milky Way+
cards.description:
Gain 7 Block. Draw 1 card.
ALL Attacks in your hand deal 2 additional damage this combat.

cards.name: Mysterious Beam
cards.description: Add a random Attack to your hand. Deal damage equal to the damage of the card added.

cards.name: Mysterious Beam+
cards.description: Add a random upgraded Attack to your hand. Deal damage equal to the damage of the card added.

cards.name: Non-Directional Laser
cards.description: Deal 5 damage to ALL enemies, then deal 5 damage to a random enemy.

cards.name: Non-Directional Laser+
cards.description: Deal 7 damage to ALL enemies, then deal 7 damage to a random enemy.

cards.name: Shooting Echo
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
Exhaust a card. 
If the card you exhaust is Burn ,put this card back to your hand.

cards.name: Shooting Echo+
cards.description:
Deal 14 damage.
Exhaust a card. 
If the card you exhaust is Burn ,put this card back to your hand.

cards.name: Spore Crump
cards.description:
Apply 2 Vulnerable to an enemy.
Amplify  [E]  : Apply 2 Vulnerable to ALL enemies instead.

cards.name: Spore Crump+
cards.description:
Apply 3 Vulnerable to an enemy.
Amplify  [E]  : Apply 3 Vulnerable to ALL enemies instead.

cards.name: Unstable Bomb
cards.description: Deal random damage ( 1 to 4 ) to a random enemy 4 times.

cards.name: Unstable Bomb+
cards.description: Deal random damage ( 2 to 5 ) to a random enemy 4 times.

cards.name: Upgrade!
cards.description: ALL Attacks in your hand deal 2 additional damage this combat.

cards.name: Upgrade!+
cards.description: ALL Attacks in your hand deal 3 additional damage this combat.

cards.name: Witch Leyline
cards.description: Deal 10 damage. Add 1 Burns to your hand.

cards.name: Witch Leyline+
cards.description: Deal 14 damage. Add 1 Burns to your hand.

cards.name: Witch Of Greed
cards.description:
At the end of combat, gain 15 gold. 
 Amplify  [E] : Also obtain a random potion.

cards.name: Witch Of Greed+
cards.description:
At the end of combat, gain 25 gold. 
 Amplify  [E] : Also obtain a random potion.

cards.name: Alice's Gift
cards.description:
Retain. Deal 5 Damage. Exhaust .
Amplify [E]  [E] : Deal triple damage.

cards.name: Alice's Gift+
cards.description:
Retain. Deal 7 Damage. Exhaust .
Amplify [E]  [E] : Deal triple damage.

cards.name: Blaze Away
cards.description: Play the last Attack you played this turn 1 time(s).

cards.name: Blaze Away+
cards.description: Play the last Attack you played this turn 2 time(s).

cards.name: Charge-Up Spray
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
If this card consumes Charge-up, gain [E] and draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Charge-Up Spray+
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage.
If this card consumes Charge-up, gain [E] and draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Charging Up
cards.description:
Gain 5 Charge-up.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Charging Up+
cards.description:
Gain 8 Charge-up.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Dark Matter
cards.description:
Can only be played once per turn.
Shuffle 2 copies of this card into your draw pile. Draw 1 card. When this card is Exhausted, gain 5 Block.
Ethereal.

cards.name: Dark Matter+
cards.description:
Can only be played once per turn.
Shuffle 2 copies of this card into your draw pile. Draw 1 card. When this card is Exhausted, gain 7 Block.
Ethereal .

cards.name: Dark Spark
cards.description: Exhaust top 5 cards of your draw pile,deal 7 damage to ALL enemies for each Attack Exhausted.

cards.name: Dark Spark+
cards.description: Exhaust top 8 cards of your draw pile,deal 7 damage to ALL enemies for each Attack Exhausted.

cards.name: Deep Ecological Bomb
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage to a random enemy, then reduce its Strength by 2 this turn.
Amplify  [E]  : Apply this effect again.

cards.name: Deep Ecological Bomb+
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage to a random enemy, then reduce its Strength by 3 this turn.
Amplify  [E]  : Apply this effect again.

cards.name: Dragon Meteor
cards.description:
Deal 14 damage.
Deals an additional 1 damage for each card in your exhaust pile.

cards.name: Dragon Meteor+
cards.description:
Deal 14 damage.
Deals an additional 2 damage for each card in your exhaust pile.

cards.name: Earthlight Ray
cards.description:
Heal 4 HP. Exhaust.
Amplify  [E]  : Put a random card from your discard pile into your hand.

cards.name: Earthlight Ray+
cards.description:
Heal 6 HP. Exhaust.
Amplify  [E]  : Put a card from your discard pile into your hand.

cards.name: Energy Flow
cards.description: Gain 2 Charge-up at the end of your turn.

cards.name: Energy Flow+
cards.description: Gain 3 Charge-up at the end of your turn.

cards.name: Energy Recoil
cards.description: Gain Block equal to your Charge-up.

cards.name: Energy Recoil+
cards.description: Gain Block equal to your Charge-up + 3.

cards.name: Event Horizon
cards.description: 1 time(s) each turn, when you activate an Amplify effect, you can put an Attack from your discard pile into your hand.

cards.name: Event Horizon+
cards.description: 2 time(s) each turn, when you activate an Amplify effect, you can put an Attack from your discard pile into your hand.

cards.name: Fairy Destruction Ray
cards.description: Deal 5 damage to all enemies. Amplify  [E]  [E] : Instant-kill those with 17 or less HP.

cards.name: Fairy Destruction Ray+
cards.description: Deal 8 damage to all enemies. Amplify  [E]  [E] : Instant-kill those with 22 or less HP.

cards.name: Gas Giant
cards.description: Gain 14 Block. Add 1 Burns to your hand.

cards.name: Gas Giant+
cards.description: Gain 18 Block. Add 1 Burns to your hand.

cards.name: Machine Gun Spark
cards.description:
Deal 1 damage 6 times.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Machine Gun Spark+
cards.description:
Deal 1 damage 8 times.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Magic Absorber
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block. Remove a random debuff from yourself.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Magic Absorber+
cards.description:
Gain 11 Block. Remove a random debuff from yourself.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Magic Chant
cards.description:
Choose a card in your draw pile,add it to your hand and upgrade it.
Exhaust .

cards.name: Magic Chant+
cards.description:
Choose a card in your draw pile,add it to your hand and upgrade it.
Exhaust .

cards.name: Mana Convection
cards.description:
Exhaust up to 2 cards,gain  [E]  for each card exhausted.
Exhaust .

cards.name: Mana Convection+
cards.description:
Exhaust up to 3 cards,gain  [E]  for each card exhausted.
Exhaust .

cards.name: Meteonic Shower
cards.description:
Exhaust up to X + 1 cards.
Deal 3 damage to a random enemy 2 times for each card you Exhausted, or 3 times for each Burn Exhausted.

cards.name: Meteonic Shower+
cards.description:
Exhaust up to X + 1 cards.
Deal 4 damage to a random enemy 2 times for each card you Exhausted, or 3 times for each Burn Exhausted.

cards.name: Occultation
cards.description: Discard your draw pile. Gain 1 Block for each card discarded.

cards.name: Occultation+
cards.description: Discard your draw pile. Gain 1 Block for each card discarded.

cards.name: One Time Off
cards.description:
Gain 5 Block. You can't activate Amplify effects this turn.
Draw 1 card(s) next turn.

cards.name: One Time Off+
cards.description:
Gain 7 Block. You can't activate Amplify effects or consume Charge-up this turn.
Draw 2 card(s) next turn.

cards.name: OortCloud
cards.description:
Gain 4 Plated Armor.
Amplify  [E]  : Gain 2 more Plated Armor.

cards.name: OortCloud+
cards.description:
Gain 5 Plated Armor.
Amplify  [E]  : Gain 3 more Plated Armor.

cards.name: Open Universe
cards.description:
Shuffle 5 random cards into your draw pile. Each of them has a 20 % chance to be Upgraded.
Draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Open Universe+
cards.description:
Shuffle 5 random cards into your draw pile. Each of them has a 30 % chance to be Upgraded.
Draw 3 cards.

cards.name: Orrerys Sun
cards.description: Whenever Charge-up is consumed, gain 6 block .

cards.name: Orrerys Sun+
cards.description: Whenever Charge-up is consumed, gain 9 block .

cards.name: Portable Prop Bag
cards.description:
Obtain a random relic.
Lose the relic when the battle ends.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Portable Prop Bag+
cards.description:
Innate.
Obtain a random relic.
Lose the relic when the battle ends.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Pulse Magic
cards.description: Next turn, gain  [E]  . Amplify [E]  : Amplify effects cost no [E] this turn.

cards.name: Pulse Magic+
cards.description: Next turn, gain [E]  [E]  . Amplify [E]  : Amplify effects cost no [E] this turn.

cards.name: Refraction Spark
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage. Increase the damage of ALL Spark cards in your hand by the unblocked damage dealt.
Amplify  [E]  : Deal 7 damage instead.

cards.name: Refraction Spark+
cards.description:
Deal 5 damage. Increase the damage of ALL Spark cards in your hand by the unblocked damage dealt.
Amplify  [E]  : Deal 9 damage instead.

cards.name: Robbery
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage. Gain gold equal to unblocked damage dealt.
Exhaust.
Amplify [E] : Double the gold you gain.

cards.name: Robbery+
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage. Gain gold equal to unblocked damage dealt.
Exhaust.
Amplify [E] : Double the gold you gain.

cards.name: Shoot The Moon
cards.description:
Remove a random buff from your target if it is not a boss enemy. Deal 8 damage.
Amplify  [E]  : Remove ALL buffs and deal 13 damage instead.

cards.name: Shoot The Moon+
cards.description:
Remove a random buff from your target if it is not a boss enemy. Deal 11 damage.
Amplify  [E]  : Remove ALL buffs and deal 18 damage instead.

cards.name: Singularity
cards.description: Whenever you play a card that costs 0, increase the damage of a random Attack in your hand by 2 .

cards.name: Singularity+
cards.description: Whenever you play a card that costs 0, increase the damage of a random Attack in your hand by 3 .

cards.name: Sprinkle Star Seal
cards.description:
Apply 99 Weak.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Sprinkle Star Seal+
cards.description:
Apply 99 Weak.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Star Barrage
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage 1 time.
Every time this card is played, it deals damage 1 additional time for this combat.

cards.name: Star Barrage+
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage 1 time.
Every time this card is played, it deals damage 1 additional time for this combat.

cards.name: Starlight Typhoon
cards.description: Exhaust ALL non-Attack cards in your hand. Add the same number of Sparks to your hand.

cards.name: Starlight Typhoon+
cards.description: Exhaust ALL non-Attack cards in your hand. Add the same number of upgraded Sparks to your hand.

cards.name: Super Perseids
cards.description:
Unplayable. When this card is drawn, gain [E].
If this card is Exhausted, deal 16 damage to a random enemy.

cards.name: Super Perseids+
cards.description:
Unplayable. When this card is drawn, gain [E].
If this card is Exhausted, deal 24 damage to a random enemy.

cards.name: Absolute Magnitude
cards.description: Deal damage equal to 2 times your Charge-up (Deals 0 damage).

cards.name: Absolute Magnitude+
cards.description: Deal damage equal to 3 times your Charge-up (Deals 0 damage).

cards.name: Big Crunch
cards.description:
Exhaust half of the cards in your discard pile and Draw Pile. Gain  [E]  and draw 1 card for every 5 cards Exhausted.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Big Crunch+
cards.description:
Exhaust half of the cards in your discard pile and Draw Pile. Gain  [E]  and draw 1 card for every 4 cards Exhausted.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Binary Stars
cards.description:
Choose to add either Black Flare Star or White Dwarf to your hand.
Amplify  [E]  : Add both to your hand instead.

cards.name: Binary Stars+
cards.description:
Choose to add and upgrade either Black Flare Star or White Dwarf to your hand.
Amplify  [E]  : Add both to your hand instead.

cards.name: Blazing Star
cards.description:
Deal 16 damage. Deals 8 additional damage for each Burn in your hand.
Amplify  [E]  : Deal double damage.

cards.name: Blazing Star+
cards.description:
Deal 20 damage. Deals 10 additional damage for each Burn in your hand.
Amplify  [E]  : Deal double damage.

cards.name: Casket Of Star
cards.description: Whenever you gain Block, add a Spark to your hand.

cards.name: Casket Of Star+
cards.description: Whenever you gain Block, add an Upgraded Spark to your hand.

cards.name: Collecting Quirk
cards.description: Deal 9 damage to a random enemy for every 4 Relics you have.

cards.name: Collecting Quirk+
cards.description: Deal 9 damage to a random enemy for every 3 Relics you have.

cards.name: Escape Velocity
cards.description: At the start of each turn, draw 2 more cards and add a Burn to your hand.

cards.name: Escape Velocity+
cards.description: At the start of each turn, draw 2 more cards and add a Burn to your hand.

cards.name: Final Spark
cards.description:
Cost 1 less  [E]  for each card containing "Spark" played this combat.
Deal 40 damage to ALL enemies.
Reset the cost of this card.

cards.name: Final Spark+
cards.description:
Retain.
Cost 1 less  [E]  for each card containing "Spark" played this combat.
Deal 40 damage to ALL enemies.
Reset the cost of this card.

cards.name: Mana Rampage
cards.description: Play X random Attacks.

cards.name: Mana Rampage+
cards.description: Play X random Upgraded Attacks.

cards.name: Max Power
cards.description:
Convert your Charge-up stacks into energy. Add 1 Exhaustion to your hand. Your attack damage is doubled this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Max Power+
cards.description:
Convert your Charge-up stacks into energy. Add 1 Exhaustion to your hand. Your attack damage is doubled this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Millisecond Pulsars
cards.description: Amplify effects cost no  [E]  this combat.

cards.name: Millisecond Pulsars+
cards.description:
Innate.
Amplify effects cost no  [E]  this combat.

cards.name: Satellite Illusion
cards.description: Gain  [E]  when the number of cards in your draw pile increases during your turn.

cards.name: Satellite Illusion+
cards.description: Innate. Gain  [E]  when the number of cards in your draw pile increases during your turn.

cards.name: Stardust Reverie
cards.description:
Shuffle your hand into your draw pile, then add that many random cards into your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Stardust Reverie+
cards.description:
Shuffle your hand into your draw pile, then add that many random Upgraded cards to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Supernova
cards.description:
No longer take damage from Burn. Whenever you Exhaust a Burn, gain 1 Strength.
Exhaust your hand at the end of each turn.

cards.name: Supernova+
cards.description:
No longer take damage from Burn. Whenever you Exhaust a Burn, gain 2 Strength.
Exhaust your hand at the end of each turn.

cards.name: TreasureHunter
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage.
If this kills a non-minion enemy in an Elite or Boss room, at the end of combat, obtain 1 random relic.
Exhaust.

cards.name: TreasureHunter+
cards.description:
Deal 17 damage.
If this kills a non-minion enemy in an Elite or Boss room, at the end of combat, obtain 1 random relic.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Ultimate Shortwave
cards.description: Gain 1 [E] and 1 Charge-up. Increase the Charge-up gain of this card by 1 and energy gain by 1 for this battle.

cards.name: Ultimate Shortwave+
cards.description: Gain 1 [E] and 1 Charge-up. Increase the Charge-up gain of this card by 2 and energy gain by 1 for this battle.

cards.name: Warming Up
cards.description: Deal 1 damage. Add a Rising Sweep, a Spark and a Witch Leyline to your hand.

cards.name: Warming Up+
cards.description: Deal 1 damage. Add a Rising Sweep, a Spark and a Witch Leyline to your hand and Upgrade them.

cards.name: Black Flare Star
cards.description:
Can only be played when you have 4 or more cards in your hand. Exhaust .
Discard any number of cards from your hand and gain 4 Block for each.

cards.name: Black Flare Star+
cards.description:
Can only be played when you have 4 or more cards in your hand. Exhaust .
Discard any number of cards from your hand and gain 6 Block for each.

cards.name: Guiding Star
cards.description:
Retain . 
 If the card is in your hand at the start of turn,gain  [E]  .

cards.name: Guiding Star+
cards.description:
Retain . 
 If the card is in your hand at the start of turn,gain  [E]  .

cards.name: Spark
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Spark+
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Exhaust.

cards.name: White Dwarf
cards.description:
Can only be played when you have 4 or less cards in your hand. Exhaust .
Deal -1 damage (2 × size of your discard pile). Add 2 Burns to your hand.

cards.name: White Dwarf+
cards.description:
Can only be played when you have 4 or less cards in your hand. Exhaust .
Deal -1 damage (3 × size of your discard pile). Add 2 Burns to your hand.

relics.name: Mini-Hakkero
relics.description: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 Charge-up .
relics.flavorText: A mini-Eight Trigram Furnace, a gift from Rinosuke when Marisa left her parents.

relics.name: Shroom Bag
relics.description: Upon pickup, obtain 2 Parasite. Parasite cards can now be played. Playing a Parasite will heal 2 HP and draw a card, then Exhausts it.
relics.flavorText: All witches have an abnormal enthusiasm for mushrooms... Or is it just Marisa...?

relics.name: Amplification Wand
relics.description: Whenever you activate an Amplify effect, gain 4 block .
relics.flavorText: A wand that seems to not be used often.

relics.name: Bread Of A Washoku Lover
relics.description:
Heal 1 hp whenever you exhaust a Status or a Curse.
When triggered 13 times, you gain 13 max HP,and this relic no longer works.
relics.flavorText: "Can you remember how many slices of bread you have eaten until now?""Thirteen. I prefer Japanese food."

relics.name: Handmade Grimoire
relics.description: At the start of battle, for every 15 cards in your master deck, gain [E] and draw a card.
relics.flavorText: A notebook full of experiment records and magic material recipes;just how Marisa develops her Magics.

relics.name: Magic Broom
relics.description: Every time you play 3 cards that cost 0, draw 1 card.
relics.flavorText: Marisa always travels on her flying broom.

relics.name: Big Shroom Bag
relics.description:
Replaces Shroom Bag .
Parasite cards can now be played. Playing a Parasite will heal 3 HP and draw 2 card, then Exhausts it.
relics.flavorText: A large version of shroom bag.

relics.name: Cat Cart
relics.description: Gain 1 charge when you climb a floor.When you would die,consume all charges and heal 4 hp for each of them.
relics.flavorText: When you fall in battle,your loyal kitties will bring you back to life with this.

relics.name: Sprouting Branch
relics.description: At the start of combat, gain 5 Regen .
relics.flavorText: The dead branch just come to life in Marisa's hand,how poetic.

relics.name: Bewitched Hakkero
relics.description:
Replaces Mini-Hakkero .
Whenever you play a card , gain 1 Charge-up .
gain 1 more if it is a Spark card.
relics.flavorText: Its firepower is on a new level, but is it ok to use a bewitched tool?

relics.name: Experimental Familiar
relics.description:
At the start of each turn, add 1 Spark to your hand.
At the start of combat, you can choose 1 from 3 random cards. It costs 0 this turn.
relics.flavorText: A Familiar looks just like a shiny orb. Not very powerful, but it will surely help you a lot.

relics.name: Rampaging Magic Tool
relics.description:
Gain [E] at the start of each turn.
Apply a random debuff/buff ( 2 Frail , 2 Weak , 2 Vulnerable , 3 Poison , 8 Charge-up )to you at the start of each combat.
relics.flavorText: It's been so long since anyone last used them. Who knows what could happen?

relics.name: Simple Launcher
relics.description: Reduce your Charge-up consumption threshold value from 8 to 6 .
relics.flavorText: A flashlight is a flashlight,no matter how it is called...

keywords.name: Black Flare Star
keywords.description: Black Flare Star is a skill card costs 0 and grants you Block by discarding cards.

keywords.name: Charge-up
keywords.description: For every 8 stacks,double the damage of your next Attack.

keywords.name: Exhaustion
keywords.description: Exhaustion prevent you from gaining or using Charge-Up .

keywords.name: Spark
keywords.description: Spark is an attack card costs 0 energy and exhausts upon use.

keywords.name: White Dwarf
keywords.description: White Dwarf is a attack card costs 0 and deals damage depending on the size of your discard pile.

keywords.name: Wraith
keywords.description: Wraith will exhaust a random card in your hand after the start of your turn.

keywords.name: Amplify
keywords.description: Pay extra energy for its effect when you have enough [E] .

keywords.name: Is only shown to
keywords.description: Well...That means you may not able to see it...

keywords.name: True Magicians
keywords.description: Perhaps Marisa is not one though.
